amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 436 to allow federal agencies to use the social cost of carbon in rule makings and guidance documents.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike Section 436 to allow federal agencies to use the social cost of carbon in rule makings and guidance documents.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 241 (Roll no. 432).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 241 (Roll no. 432).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Peters.
